law.text: The farm bureau may use part or all of the sums annually received as dues from its members in payment of dues or assessments levied or assessed against it by the State Federation of Farm Bureaus or the American Farm Bureau Federation or in any manner designed to promote the best interests of its members.
law.history: Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 5, effective May 18, 1956. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 42d-5.
